attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Our Doctor at Kimberley Clinic Kimberley Nottingham is retiring and we are trying to keep the surgery open, we have over 2000 patients and we all want the surgery to remain open. We have fantastic staff and offer a very wide range of services for all the public and we want to keep those services for all.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with your PCT.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
